```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#### define required libraries ####
require(shiny)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#### change max file size ####
options(shiny.maxRequestSize = 25 * 1024^2)  # 25 mb

#### upload data file ####
shinyApp(
  
  ui = fluidPage(
    
    titlePanel('Upload a National Student Clearinghouse raw data file'),
    
    fileInput('nsc', 'where\'s your NSC file?', multiple = FALSE, accept = NULL),
    
    mainPanel(
      textOutput('uploadInc'))
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output) {
    
    output$uploadInc <-
      
      renderText({
        
        if (is.null(input$nsc))
          print('nothing uploaded yet')
        
        })
      
    },
  
  options = list(height = 500)
)
```
